title: Jimbot Commands
description:
(replace ? with your servers prefix)
Quotations are required around parameters

fields.name: Get Unit Information
fields.value:
- **?unit** *[name] [optional | parameter]*
- optional: Add parameters to shorten the results for only desired information **contained in quotes**
- example: **?unit Malphasie "STMR"**  | this will only return malphasie's STMR
- parameters: "Name", "Limited", "Exclusive", "Job", "Role", "Origin",
"Gender", "STMR", "Trust", "Race", "Number", "Chain", "Rarity"

fields.name: Get Unit Skill Information
fields.value:
- **?unitname** *search*
- **?kit** [unit name] "[search terms]* (will return both passives and actives)
- **?ability** [unit name] "[search terms]" (will return only active abilities)
- **?passive** [unit name] "[search terms]" (will return only passive abilities)
- Search a units skill set for any keywords to return the skills that match.
- example: **?noctis fire**
- parameters: keywords can be separated by the pipe character (|).
Or separated into quotes for each, "one" "two" "three"

fields.name: Get Unit GIFs
fields.value:
- **?gif** *[name]* "[parameter]"
- parameters: 'attack', 'dead', 'dying', 'idle', 'jump', 'limit', 'win',
'magic attack', 'magic standby', 'move','standby', 'win before'
- example: **?gif Esther "attack"**

fields.name: Get Unit Calculations
fields.value:
- **?dpt** *[unit name -or- category]* "[limit]"
- **?burst** *[unit name -or- category]* "[limit]"
- optional: the amount of results to return, default is 5.
- example: **?dpt Esther**
You can search for multiple units at once by separating the names with a pipe(|) character.

fields.name: Get Top DPS
fields.value:
- **?topdps** *[optional category]*
- category: physical, magic, hybrid
Get the top 10 DPS for GL. no parameter will return the top 10 from all categories. Provide a category to only show the units of that type.
